summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4727 for the improvement of the south 113 feet of the alley in Block 49, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, extending from Pine Street north, and between Boren Avenue and Minor Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54679, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
